00017 #include <unistd.h>
00018 #include <fcntl.h>
00019 #include <string.h>

00026 /* 
00027  * Warning: the rename is done properly for a SINGLE branch. 
00028  * How should it change if we have many directories from different
00029  * file systems underneath us?
00030  */
00031 
00032 static int normal_rename(HybfsData *data, const char *from, const char *to, int rootlen)
00033 {
00034         string *pf, *pt;
00035         int ret = 0;
00036         int brid_to, brid_from;
00037 
00038         DBG_SHOWFC();
00039         
00040         /* get absolute paths for both files */
00041         pf = resolve_path(data, from+rootlen, &brid_from);
00042         if (pf == NULL)
00043                 return -ENOMEM;
00044         pt = resolve_path(data, to+rootlen, &brid_to);
00045         if (pt == NULL)
00046                 return -ENOMEM;
00047         
00048         if(brid_to != brid_from) {
00049                 PRINT_ERROR("Cannot do rename between multiple directories!\n");
00050                 return -EINVAL;
00051         }
00052         /* do the real rename */
00053         ret = rename(pf->c_str(), pt->c_str());
00054         if (ret == 0) {
00055                 ret = data->virtual_replace_query(from, to, brid_from);
00056         }
00057 
00058         delete pf;
00059         delete pt;
00060 
00061         return ret;
00062 }
00063 
00064 int hybfs_rename(const char *from, const char *to)
00065 {
00066         int res = 0;
00067         int nqueries;
00068         int rootlen;
00069         string to_copy;
00070         PathCrawler *pcf = NULL; 
00071         PathCrawler *pct = NULL;
00072         
00073         HybfsData *hybfs_core = get_data();
00074 
00075         DBG_SHOWFC();
00076         DBG_PRINT("from: %s to: %s\n", from, to);
00077         
00078         /* sanity checks */
00079         if(IS_ROOT(from) || IS_ROOT(to))
00080                 return -EINVAL;
00081         
00082         /* For now accept only adding or changing tags for a real path.
00083          * A real path should only come from the virtual directory 'path:/' */
00084         pcf = new PathCrawler(from);
00085         if(pcf == NULL)
00086                 return -ENOMEM;
00087         
00088         nqueries = pcf->break_queries();
00089         if(nqueries != 0) {
00090                 res = -EINVAL;
00091                 goto out;
00092         }
00093 
00094         rootlen = strlen(REAL_DIR);
00095         if(strncmp(from+1, REAL_DIR,rootlen - 1) !=0) {
00096                 res = -EINVAL;
00097                 goto out;
00098         }
00099 
00100         /* now check the second path */
00101         pct = new PathCrawler(to);
00102         if(pct == NULL) {
00103                 res = -ENOMEM;
00104                 goto out;
00105         }
00106 
00107         /* If the second is a real path, then do the real rename */
00108         nqueries = pct->break_queries();
00109         if(nqueries == 0 && strncmp(to+1, REAL_DIR, rootlen-1) ==0) {
00110                 DBG_PRINT("from %s to %s\n", from, to);
00111                 res = normal_rename(hybfs_core, from, to, rootlen);
00112                 goto out;
00113         }
00114         
00115         to_copy = pct->get_first_path();
00116         
00117         while(pct->has_next_query()) {
00118                 string to_query = pct->pop_next_query();
00119                 
00120                 res = hybfs_core->virtual_addtag(to_query.c_str(), from+rootlen);
00121                 if (res)
00122                         goto out;
00123                 
00124         }
00125         if(pct->get_first_path().find(REAL_DIR))
00126         /* now, if I need to do a real rename, remember to do it here */
00127         if(to_copy.length() > 0)
00128                 res = normal_rename(hybfs_core, from, to_copy.c_str(), rootlen);
00129 
00130 out:
00131         if(pcf)
00132                 delete pcf;
00133         if(pct)
00134                 delete pct;
00135         
00136         return res;
00137 }
00138 
00139 int hybfs_unlink(const char *path)
00140 {
00141         int res, brid;
00142         std::string *p;
00143 
00144         HybfsData *hybfs_core = get_data();
00145         
00146         DBG_SHOWFC();
00147 
00148         /* if the path is real than delete the file, else, if it's a query, get
00149          * the file names from the database and delete each file */
00150         
00151         p = resolve_path(hybfs_core, path, &brid);
00152         res = unlink(p->c_str());
00153         
00154         delete p;
00155         
00156         if (res == -1)
00157         return -errno;
00158 
00159         return 0;
00160 }
